subject: Can't stand sex all day long?
body:
Your lady can't have orgasms? Heh, body, it's your fault. Do you want to fix that?
Click here to become a sex giant
Viagra, Cialis, Valium, Levitra and more medications
Click here to become a sex giant
Make secure and confidential purchases. Nobody will know that you are using medications.
With best regards,
James Carroll
 
 
Poiavlenie mechnika Oshelomilo vseh bez iskliucheniia, ved ego schitali uzhe pogibshim vmeste so vsem Otriadom Altaresa. Ta zhe sila vzdernula menia vverh, otdeliv nogi ot zemli I triahnuv tak, chto golova zvezdanulas o sobstvennoe plecho. Vstupiv na territoriiu Goroda, ty avtomaticheski lishilsia vseh svoih deneg. Vhod, okno, stol shefira i sam Koordinator kanuli v nikuda. 
Kvin sglotnul podstupivshij k gorlu komok i koe-kak vydavil: Ia. Zato po kakim-to prichinam ia predstavliaiu Cennost dlia tebia. Mimo vse tak zhe Delovito snovali sheltiane, ne obrashchaia na menia vidimogo vnimaniia. Podgotovka portala . Prezhde vsego, frajdeny leshuki-nedouchki. Nogi podlomilis, shest vyvalilsia iz ruk. Vorota isportit, hald prokliatyj, a emu, vratniku, otvechat pered gorodskim Sovetom za isporchennoe imushchestvo. U menia ved ne prosto mech. 
Da, takogo demona Sledovalo ostanovit. Molodec krasovalsia na Fone nochnogo zvezdnogo neba i nesushchihsia vdal kosmoletov, a v ruke u nego Byl chernyj chemodanchik s emblemoj Pochtovoj Korporacii Novy-2. Shefir sarkasticheski usmehnulsia, plotno somknuv tonkie guby. Riadom nichkom tiazhko padaet massivnoe telo, korchas v Agonii. ejisuminyon XF5FVVtTW1Z0QllXUkAbREVSQFBDXlxbG1JT
